name: Antarta!
overview: Unlike most other games made with the Shoot 'Em Up Construction Kit, this is not a shooter. Instead, it's a general avoid and jump game, in which you play a penguin that got lost from the rest of his family. Can you make it back to your family, and avoid the baddies? Developed by Igor Errazkin and released as part of the 2016 SEUCK Competition.
